channel.title: Comments on: This is a Vanguard: SoH Fan Site (really)

item.title: By: Vanguard SOH Rocks
item.dc:creator: Vanguard SOH Rocks
item.description: Well Biz, I'm glad you brought that up, you see Vanguard SOH is the front line...er..that comes in after the other..er frontliners...and leads the way to..er..Did you know you get a mount at level 10!!??
item.content:encoded: Well Biz, I’m glad you brought that up, you see Vanguard SOH is the front line…er..that comes in after the other..er frontliners…and leads the way to..er..Did you know you get a mount at level 10!!??

item.title: By: Biz
item.dc:creator: Biz
item.description: Err... You do realize that "vanguard" is a common word to used to point out the foremost division or the front part of an army ? =) And that GuildWars was made years before Vanguard SoH :cough: ?
item.content:encoded: Err… You do realize that “vanguard” is a common word to used to point out the foremost division or the front part of an army ? =) And that GuildWars was made years before Vanguard SoH :cough: ?

item.title: By: PlaysWithStrangers
item.dc:creator: PlaysWithStrangers
item.description: O my god I never saw it before. I played guild wars for months and I pre-ordered Vangaurd without a second thought. They're in my head fuck what am I going to do... Oh wait I bought it because I'm addicted to EQ sorry Berk must be right.
item.content:encoded: O my god I never saw it before. I played guild wars for months and I pre-ordered Vangaurd without a second thought. They’re in my head fuck what am I going to do… Oh wait I bought it because I’m addicted to EQ sorry Berk must be right.

item.description: Wow! Good find, foton! You are one evil genious.
item.content:encoded: Wow! Good find, foton! You are one evil genious.
